item.title: Witnessing the COVID-19 Pandemic
item.author: Zhihao Ruan
item.description: As COVID-19 virus spread around the world causing serious pandemic and deaths, it also has seriously impacted countless people’s lives. As a resident in the United States, my everyday life has also been affected by this pandemic in multiple aspects. After making sure that social distancing can be properly kept when I was outdoors, I decided to take my camera and witness the changes of my daily life. Ann Arbor, MI
